data: John Doe is an early stage investor focusing on SaaS and AI startups.
John Doe has over 10 years of experience investing in technology startups.
John Doe led Series A and B financing rounds for several high-profile companies.
John Doe worked in product management at a major technology firm prior to venture capital.
John Doe is an active angel investor and mentor at startup accelerators.
John Doe is located in San Francisco, California, in the United States.
John Doe researched recent funding rounds and public interviews from January 2024.
